column1: '''''Vinyar Tengwar''''' '''28''' is the twenty-eighth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal of the  [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]], devoted to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
* "The Bodleian Declensions" — Analysis by [[Christopher Gilson]], [[Patrick H. Wynne]], and [[Carl F. Hostetter]].
** '''The above article is previously unpublished primary material from the Tolkien archives.'''
* "Transitions in Translations: Mismatched German Translations" (column) — [[Arden R. Smith]].
::''The content list above only contains published articles.''
